info.name: fix for Manage Styles checkmarks
info.description: temporary fix for the hard to see checkmarks on some themes.  the checkbox images come from the BlackJapan Theme, will work on other checkmark children of trees as well.  Note: likely will need to reopen Manage Styles window to see the change.

data.title: I dont need it for my theme but it's nice for thos
